description: This resource adds Key-Value metadata to a Schema version of Glue Schema Registry.

SchemaVersionId.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.
SchemaVersionId.markdownDescription:
Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

Key.markdownDescription:
Metadata key

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: Replacement

Value.markdownDescription:
Metadata value

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: Replacement
